attributes.action: guarantee a Band 5 nursing job within the NHS for all newly qualified nurses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Newly qualified nurses are currently facing no opportunity of finding a nursing job within the NHS and also face losing their registration if they can't get a nursing job within a year of qualifying. As the government has invested £60k in training each nurse this is also a waste of taxpayers money as well as being detrimental to the nursing profession as a whole.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "guarantee a Band 5 nursing job within the NHS for all newly qualified nurses."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14191.asp

Prime Minister's Office
